name: vantage-fit-dashboard-automation
description: Automation framework for Vantage Fit Dashboard using Playwright

scripts.Launch_Reporter: npm run allure:generate  && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:createChallenge: playwright test tests/create-challenge-navigation.spec.ts --headed --workers=1 --project='Google Chrome' && npm run Launch_Reporter
scripts.test:customChallenge: playwright test tests/E2E-flow-create_challenges/custom-challenge.spec.ts --headed --workers=1 --project='Google Chrome' && npm run Launch_Reporter
scripts.test:TargetAudienceCoverage: playwright test tests/Test-Coverage-create_challenges/custom-challengeTargetAudience.spec.ts --headed --workers=1 --project='Google Chrome' && npm run Launch_Reporter
scripts.test:ChallengeConfigActivitytaskGrp1: playwright test tests/CreateChallenge-Test_Cases/TestCoverage-ChallengeConfiguration/ActivityTask_Grp1/custom-challenge-challengeConfig.spec.ts --headed --workers=1 --project='Google Chrome' && npm run Launch_Reporter
scripts.test:ChallengeConfigActivitytaskGrp2: playwright test tests/CreateChallenge-Test_Cases/TestCoverage-ChallengeConfiguration/Activity_TaskGrp2/custom-challenge-challengeConfig.spec.ts --headed --workers=1 --project='Google Chrome' && npm run Launch_Reporter
scripts.test:ChallengeConfigActivitytaskGrp3: playwright test tests/CreateChallenge-Test_Cases/TestCoverage-ChallengeConfiguration/Activity_TaskGrp3/custom-challenge-challengeConfig.spec.ts --headed --workers=1 --project='Google Chrome' && npm run Launch_Reporter
scripts.test:Manage_Challenge-Coverage: playwright test tests/ManageChallenge-Test_Cases/Manage-challenge-Coverage.spec.ts --headed --workers=1 --project='Google Chrome' && npm run Launch_Reporter
scripts.test:Journey_Challenge: playwright test tests/E2E-flow-create_challenges/journey-challnege.spec.ts --headed --workers=1 --project='Google Chrome' && npm run Launch_Reporter
